discussion: Initial contact made with the prospect. They showed interest in our calibration services for their manufacturing unit. Discussed their current calibration needs and timeline.
nextAction: Send detailed proposal with pricing by end of week

discussion: Follow-up call completed. Prospect reviewed our proposal and had some questions about the calibration process. Explained our methodology and quality standards.
nextAction: Schedule technical presentation with their engineering team

discussion: Technical presentation completed successfully. Engineering team was impressed with our capabilities and asked for references from similar industries.
nextAction: Provide reference contacts and follow up in 1 week

discussion: First contact via email. Prospect inquired about vision measuring machines for their quality control department. Sent product catalog and specifications.
nextAction: Follow up with phone call to discuss requirements in detail

discussion: Phone call completed. Discussed their specific requirements for vision measuring machines. They need equipment for measuring precision parts with accuracy up to 0.001mm.
nextAction: Prepare customized quotation with technical specifications

discussion: Initial meeting at their facility. They are looking for data logger solutions for environmental monitoring. Showed them our range of products and discussed their specific needs.
nextAction: Send detailed proposal with multiple options

discussion: Follow-up call to discuss proposal. They liked our solutions but have budget constraints. Discussed payment terms and financing options.
nextAction: Prepare revised proposal with flexible payment terms

discussion: Cold call made to introduce our calibration software. They were not aware of our company but showed some interest in learning more about our solutions.
nextAction: Send introductory email with case studies and benefits

discussion: Email inquiry received about Meatest equipment. They are a new calibration lab looking to expand their capabilities. Sent detailed information about our Meatest range.
nextAction: Schedule online demonstration of Meatest equipment

discussion: Online demonstration completed. They were very impressed with the accuracy and features of our Meatest equipment. Asked about delivery timeline and training.
nextAction: Prepare quotation with delivery schedule and training package
